steps: Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Insert' tab, click on 'Text Box' and select 'Simple Text Box'.
A text box will be inserted into the document.
Type the name of the person on the business card in the text box.
Format the text box as desired, such as adjusting the font, size, and color.
Position the text box in the desired location on the business card.
Repeat steps 4-7 for other details like job title, company name, and contact information.
